thread.section_title: Viking Bags Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Viking Bags | vikingbags.com
thread.title: Mike

author: Mike
title: Mike
text: The bags are the very best quality I've seen in an aftermarket bags. The directions are not very clear to read or even look at the pictures, the install videos on the website were recorded in a very dark light so it's very hard to see what they are assembling. The bags fit and look amazing now that I went to the hardware store and got the right Length hardware. And let face it nylock nuts go along way it would of been nice if they were included.
